data.message: I did not ask for fb's political statements to be a part of my newsfeed.

replies.message: Um, this is facebook...saying that is like subscribing to a page and then complaining about having its posts show up on your newsfeed lol...idiot
^Buttt you're gay?
your point?
You can't have kids. Idiot.
"I'm gonna adopt!" Guess what. Technically those aren't your kids.
Um what does a person complaining about seeing posts from facebook, while on facebook, have anything to do with having kids?
You're gay. That's what.
Again, what's your point?
Insult my intelligence by where I am from? You make me sick. How many people retire and move anywhere but the south? Not many. 3rd ranked growing state? Believe it? Mad idiot?
Also, being from South Carolina I am obviously passed you 10 fold IQ wise. Your grammar is flawed, and by the looks of your profile picture you are a drunken idiot.
trolling master race

You are getting rather defensive Sebastian, usually that means you have something to hide. Maybe you should come out of the closet. Even though you are not a very pleasant person, the gay community would still accept you because we are very good, accepting people. Much love to all of my fellow gays! XOXO Everyone have a wonderful day that is now rid of D.O.M.A!!
Katie- Did your daddy rape you as a child?
Lol um no. I haven't had bad experiences with men, I just don't want to date them, if that is what you are getting at.
I did not ask to read hateful people expressing their feelings towards today's events. Can't change that can I. Deal with it.
I completely agree with you Sebastian just ignore all those gay rights supporters
